name: Splatscalation
description:
Submission for the 2018 Summer #ue4jam - Theme: "Well that escalated quickly"

Online Multiplayer paint it up game with up to 8 people!

Fly around and paint the arena with your color while trying to prevent your enemy from doing the same! Lay mines to trap your enemy or shoot bombs directly at them, to make them drop power ups! You only have 100 seconds to paint, so its gonna be wild!

Pre-made content: Player character spaceships, grid material of the battlefield.
